vecHighlight.strDescription: Find and kill all the most dangerous monstrosities located in dead zones
Finish all quests in the game
Find all the volunteer's voice recordings
Kill 100 monsters using the boat's speed boost
Find all pages from the guide book
Rescue 20 NPCs that have been grabbed by monsters

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: Find a boat for use in the jungle
Gain access to a long-range radio station
Survive the horde on the roof
Enter the docks in Quarantine Zone

data.strFullDescription:
Continue the story of the outbreak and see another paradise gone to hell - fully remastered.

[h2]Paradise gone to Hell![/h2]
Welcome to the zombie apocalypse experience of a lifetime – and now more beautiful than ever. Caught in the midst of an epic zombie outbreak on the tropical island of Banoi, your only thought is: [i]Survive![/i]

[h2]The Dead Island Experience[/h2]
Smash heads, crack skulls and slice ‘em up with visceral astounding melee combat and true story-based 4 player co-op in a sprawling open world just waiting for exploration.

[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2]
[list][*]Includes all previously released DLC![/list]
[list][*][i]Fully remastered:[/i] Experience Dead Island: Riptide in crisp full HD with improved graphics, game models and a photorealistic lighting system with physically based shading[/list]
[list][*][i]Adrenaline-Fuelled Combat:[/i] Smash heads, crack skulls and slice ‘em up with the weapon of your choice in the visceral astounding melee combat[/list]
[list][*][i]Seamless Coop Multiplayer:[/i] Collaborate with your friends, live through a story of the struggle for survival in a world gone mad[/list]
[list][*][i]Experience the atmosphere:[/i] Experience the dense atmosphere - feel the destruction, the horror and madness. Immerse yourself in the turmoil that is taking place on the Island.[/list]
data.strSnippet: Welcome to the zombie apocalypse experience of a lifetime – more beautiful than ever. Caught in an epic zombie outbreak on the tropical island of Banoi, your only thought is: Survive!
